scripts.create-bucket: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket lambda-dynamo-demo --region ap-southeast-2 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=ap-southeast-2
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src -d dist --ignore '**/*.spec.js' && cp package.json dist && yarn install --cwd dist --production --no-lockfile
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --s3-bucket lambda-dynamo-demo --output-template-file packaged-template.yaml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-template.yaml --stack-name lambda-dynamo-demo --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.build-package-deploy: yarn run build && yarn run package && yarn run deploy
